short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mirrors the page when you click the icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple app for using Chrome with your teleprompter. Vertically flips (mirrors) the contents of the page. (Does not support all websites (for example YouTube) and does not support scrolling).
